org.jerkar.internal.ivy
Class JkIvyPublisher

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.internal.ivy.JkIvyPublisher

public final class JkIvyPublisher
extends java.lang.Object

Ivy wrapper providing high level methods. The API is expressed using Jerkar classes only (mostly free of Ivy classes).

publishToIvyRepo

public void publishToIvyRepo(JkVersionedModule versionedModule,
                             JkIvyPublication publication,
                             JkDependencies dependencies,
                             JkScope defaultScope,
                             JkScopeMapping defaultMapping,
                             java.util.Date deliveryDate)
Publish the specified module. Dependencies, default scopes and mapping are necessary in order to generate the ivy.xml file.

Parameters:
versionedModule - The module/version to publish.
publication - The artifacts to publish.
dependencies - The dependencies of the published module.
defaultScope - The default scope of the published module
defaultMapping - The default scope mapping of the published module
deliveryDate - The delivery date.
